# zcalc

[![Build Status](https://app.travis-ci.com/blackchip-org/zcalc.svg?branch=main)](https://app.travis-ci.com/blackchip-org/zcalc)

A fun RPN calculator.

Work in progress.

To run:

```bash
pip install -e .
zcalc
```

Setup python 3.7 environment on macOS:

```bash
brew install python@3.7
